Home » 40P15 Dhammānulomapaccanīya (3), Dukatikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (3)
54 Bhāvanāyapahātabbaduka, Kusalattika
Bhāvanāyapahātabbaduka, Kusalattika
63.
177Nabhāvanāya pahātabbaṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nabhāvanāya pahātabbo nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuyā ekaṃ…pe…  avigate ekaṃ.
178Bhāvanāya pahātabbaṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nabhāvanāya pahātabbo naakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā… . Hetuyā dve…pe…  avigate dve.
179Nabhāvanāya pahātabbaṃ abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nanabhāvanāya pahātabbo naabyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā… . Hetuyā dve…pe…  avigate dve.
